level.heading: AMENDMENT BEFORE MAKING SUBSTANTIAL CHANGES (ยง 23-503)

level.text: The Board may fine, revoke, and suspend a license, or deny a pending application for renewal of a license, when a license holder has been found to have made a substantial change in its operations as described in D.C. Official Code ยง 25-762 without Board approval.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 51 DCR 4309 (April 30, 2004); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 55 DCR 12991 (December 26, 2008); as amended by D.C. ACT 17-696 published at 56 DCR 1204, 1207 (February 6, 2009).
